issue.title: Camera sensors not updated without shadows (and directional light) in scence

content.raw:
You can find an example world file [here](https://gist.github.com/andreasBihlmaier/9802981).
You also need the [model camera_ros](https://gist.github.com/andreasBihlmaier/9803002) (although you might be one of the last persons that needs this information, perhaps others want to test it, too: simply copy model.sdf and model.config to ~/.gazebo/models/camera_ros).

If you start gazebo (rosrun gazebo_ros gazebo camera_shadows_problem.xml) and watch the image topic (e.g. rqt Image View plugin) everything is fine (the pendulum is moving in gzclient and the camera stream).
Now disable shadows (GUI: Scene -> shadows [ ] False), the camera stream stops.
If you reenable the shadows the camera stream will also start again.
